record.title: REMOVAL OF NAME OF MEMBER AS COSPONSOR OF H.R. 3898
record.narrative:
REMOVAL OF NAME OF MEMBER AS COSPONSOR OF H.R. 3898 -- (House of Representatives - October 22, 2007)

[Page: H11820]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that Congressman Kuhl be removed as a cosponsor to H.R. 3898.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from New York?
